summary.span: Describes and represents an enumeration type.

span.span: Describes and represents an enumeration type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，就必須定義使用的列舉型別因為列舉型別，其項目屬於型別就會發出而不是列舉類型。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, it is necessary to define enumerations using because emits enumerations whose elements are of type instead of the enumeration type. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，發出的列舉其項目具有正確的類型。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, emits enumerations whose elements have the correct type. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範在動態組件，使用列舉型別的建構`EnumBuilder`。The following code example demonstrates the construction of an enumeration within a dynamic assembly, using `EnumBuilder`. 此範例會定義名為列舉型別`Elevation`，與基礎型別，並建立兩個項目： `Low`，值為 0，和`High`，值為 1。The example defines an enumeration named `Elevation`, with an underlying type of , and creates two elements: `Low`, with a value of 0, and `High`, with a value of 1. 已建立的類型之後，組件會儲存名稱`TempAssembly.dll`。After the type has been created, the assembly is saved with the name `TempAssembly.dll`. 您可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)來檢查此組件的內容。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the contents of this assembly. > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework 2.0 版中之前, 此程式碼範例不會產生正確的列舉型別。Prior to the .NET Framework version 2.0, this code example does not produce a correct enumeration. [!code-cpp[ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum/CPP/modulebuilder_defineenum.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum/CS/modulebuilder_defineenum.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ModuleBuilder_DefineEnum/VB/modulebuilder_defineenum.vb#1)]
